title: Me
text:
Howdy! I’m Anish Shah. I am a…

Proud Dad Dad to Harper and Ripley
Husband to a Wonderful and Beautiful Wife
Cardiology/Research Fellow at the University of Illinois at Chicago and the Jesse Brown VA
Former Resident of the J. Willis Hurst Internal Medicine Residency
Alumni of Texas A&M University for my doctorate and Emory University for my baccalaureate and master’s degree
